first_para: Julie Ann Hilling (born 29 April 1955) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bolton West since the general election in May 2010 and an Opposition Whip since 2012.

full.extract: Julie Ann Hilling (born 29 April 1955) is a British Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Bolton West since the general election in May 2010 and an Opposition Whip since 2012.
full.title: Julie Hilling
